name: Thorium Wars
description:
In Thorium Wars, stop the Thorions, a
super species of Thorium-powered
machines, from destroying mankind.
Blast through waves of Thorions by
controlling an arsenal of tanks,
skyfighters, hovercrafts, gunboats,
and starfighters with either the
standard or Touch screen controls. In
twelve exciting missions, navigate
through a variety of combat
environments viewing 360 degrees of
the battlefield, fully rendered in 3-D.
Toggle between first and third person
views to destroy the terrifying army of
Thorium beasts ranging from swarms
of Redeye Drones to the bone
crushing Manticore Walker. Take
control of the outcome in this man vs.
machine extreme battle as Thorium
Wars proves to be the ultimate test for
the survival of the fittest.
